definition: weight/pendant/same as 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]/ballad singing accompanied by a 墜胡|坠胡[zhui4 hu2]

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Her diamond necklace must have cost a king's ransom.
sentences.chinese: 這條項鍊有一雞心型墜子。

sentences.english: I'll be glad to select a pendant that goes well with your necklace.
sentences.chinese: 我很樂意替您挑選一個配你的項鍊的墜子。

sentences.english: A pendant worn on a chain around the neck.
sentences.chinese: 這條項鍊有一雞心型墜子。

sentences.english: Like Japanese netsuke, snuff bottles were designed as hand-held treasures.
sentences.chinese: 像日本墜子一樣，鼻菸壺被設計成手持的珍品。

sentences.english: Can Jackanapes be merry when his clog is at his heel?
sentences.chinese: 猴子腳跟上綁了墜子，還能快樂地活蹦亂跳嗎？

definition: that/that kind of/that sort of/that type of
lit. mandarin ducks playing in the water/fig. to make love
to parade oneself ostentatiously about town (idiom)
